title: [1508521049] Is This Really Why You Ride Your Bike? | The GCN Show Ep. 241
description:
Welcome back to the 241st episode of The GCN Show, where we ask some important philosophical questions including why we ride, and more importantly, is Dan middle aged?!

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN

asset.title: Is This Really Why You Ride Your Bike? | The GCN Show Ep. 241
asset.description:
Welcome back to the 241st episode of The GCN Show, where we ask some important philosophical questions including why we ride, and more importantly, is Dan middle aged?!

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN
Register your interest in the GCN Club: http://gcn.eu/lI
Get exclusive GCN gear in the GCN shop! http://gcn.eu/lJ

Enter the competition to win a Kask Protone here 💪  http://gcn.eu/WinWithKask 

The big question this week on The GCN Show is Why You Ride? With some interesting findings from a recent scientific study, we reveal the answers. But are they what you expected? We'd love to know why YOU ride - tell us in the comments below. 💬

There's more news from the Vuelta a España, Canyon is in the USA, Temple Cycles prove to be a modern business and there's plenty of pro transfer news too.

What do you think of Tom Dumoulin's #GTNPainCave set up? Hear the latest from Mark Beaumont, and we check out Team Sky's new Race Hub.

Tech of the Week features the NGEco power meter from Power2Max. At less than €500, it adds another quality power meter to the market.

#wattagebazooka goes to Astana rider Brumotti, and to Andy Woodruff for his singlespeed 404 mile 24 hour bike ride! 

Hack/bodge of the week yields some great hacks for bike travel and a pretty rad bike dog. 

Don't forget to enter our caption competition this week for the chance to win a GCN Camelbak bottle. Good luck! 🤞

Fizik will be launching their 2018 range next week - stay tuned! 

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍  http://gcn.eu/lK

Watch more on GCN...
Check out Team Sky's Race Hub 📹  http://gcn.eu/RaceHub
Can Dan really run? 📹  http://gcn.eu/DanRuns
Photos: © Bettiniphoto / http://www.bettiniphoto.net/ & ©Tim De Waele / http://www.tdwsport.com

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
